alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SUMTER...EASTERN PASCO...SOUTHEASTERN HERNANDO...NORTHWESTERN POLK AND NORTHEASTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Zephyrhills North, or near Dade City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Dade City, St. Leo, Hillsborough River State Park, Hill n Dale, Zephyrhills South, Zephyrhills West, Zephyrhills North, Lake Alfred, Ridge Manor, Polk City, San Antonio, Saint Leo, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Richland, Kathleen, and Rockridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
